recipeData.name: Sandia (Watermelon)
recipeData.description: 1 cup of watermelon juice, 4 cups of water, 1/4th a cup of lime juice and sugar to taste

recipeData.name: Pepino con limon (Cucumber with Lime)
recipeData.altText: Photo of Pepino con limon Agua Fresca
recipeData.description: 1 cup of cucumber juice, 4 cups of water, 1/4th a cup of lime juice and sugar to taste

recipeData.name: Sandia Picante (Spicy Watermelon)
recipeData.altText: Photo of Sandia Picante Agua Fresca
recipeData.description: 1 cup of watermelon juice, 4 cups of water, 1/4th a cup of lime juice, chamoy around the rim of cup, sugar and tajin to taste
